name: TiVo Video Recording Archive
summary: A TMF file is a .TAR archive (tarball) that contains multiple files created by various TiVo DVR devices, which includes TiVo Series 1, 2, and 2.5 and DirecTV TiVo Series 1 and 2. It stores one or more TiVo .TY video files and an .XML metadata file that contains information about the recording. TMF files are typically used for archiving content onto a computer that was recorded on a TiVo device or for transferring content from one TiVo device to another.
